name: Gomoku Classic
description:
Gomoku is originated from China (五子棋) and popular in Japan, and all over the world. It is also known as Renju, Gobang, Connect 5 or Five in a row.

Turn your iPhone/iPad into a Gomoku game board and challenge your friends or the computer in this fun to play strategy game. The rule is simple, be the first to get an unbroken row of five pieces horizontally, vertically or diagonally to win the game. But like any strategy game with simple rules, good offense-defense balance is the key to win.

Game Features:
- Play against the computer or play with friends.
- Full game center supported.
- Standard 26x26 board.
- Unlimited undo moves.
- Nice sound effect.

Hope you like it! Send us feedback if you have any questions. azhuona@gmail.com
